headline: JPMorgan’s Same-Store Sales Upgrade Might Change The Case For Investing In Dollar General (DG)
summary: Earlier this week, JPMorgan upgraded Dollar General to Overweight, citing its exposure to low- and middle-income shoppers, improving operations, and expectations for steady same-store sales growth into fiscal 2026. Analysts now see Dollar General as a clearer barometer of consumer stress, with its margins and traffic trends offering important clues about how value-focused households are coping with persistent cost pressures. Now we’ll examine how JPMorgan’s upgraded view on Dollar General’s...
